channel.title: Google Earth Engine Introduction on ISP - Image and Signal Processing group
channel.description: Recent content in Google Earth Engine Introduction on ISP - Image and Signal Processing group

item.description: GEE Course Material Part 1 Code gee_tutorial_01.js /**** Start of imports. If edited, may not auto-convert in the playground. ****/ var l8 = ee.ImageCollection("LANDSAT/LC8_L1T_TOA"); /***** End of imports. If edited, may not auto-convert in the playground. *****/ // 1. Simple way to show an image var image = ee.Image('LANDSAT/LC8_L1T_TOA/LC81930282013158LGN00'); Map.centerObject(image); Map.addLayer(image, trueColor, 'True color image'); // 2. Filter an image collection selecting date range var filtered = l8.filterDate('2013-01-01', '2014-12-31'); //print(filtered.size()); // The median is computed using map-reduce (automatically!
